replies.author: 魁魅
replies.txt_content:
/rpgitem jian create
/rpgitem jian display 单手剑
/rpgitem jian hand 单手
/rpgitem jian type 剑
/rpgitem jian damage
伤害
/rpgitem jian quality
Common (普通) Uncommon (优秀) Rare (稀有) Epic (史诗) Legendary (传说) 
/rpgitem jian durability
耐久

按照上面的顺序去做jian是物品的名字

很简单，其实有Nbtedit 这个MOD就行。
